name: Basketball Fat to Fit Gym - real sports stars jump-ing & run shoot toss game for kids!
name_original: Basketball Fat to Fit Gym - real sports stars jump-ing & run shoot toss game for kids!
description:
Can you get these overweight basketball players to lose weight and get in shape just in time for the playoffs?

To lose weight fast, they are going to need your help!!

Watch what they eat, exercise 20x a day, and make sure they hit the weight room!!!

Once one basketball star loses weight, move onto other characters, and help them out as well!

Run on the treadmill, jump rope, box, lift weights, and much more to get fit fast!!
